EmailTemplate.subject: Get ready for SpringOne 2GX 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings Cloud Natives and Spring, Groovy and Grails users!
We are looking forward to seeing you at SpringOne 2GX 2015. For the best and smoothest arrival experience, please review the following: HOTEL/TRANSPORTATION Confirm your Hotel Room: Please call the Washington Marriott Marquis prior to arrival and check your arrival/departure date at 855-821-4281. Have your confirmation number handy.
Ground Transportation: No need for a car. Parking at the hotel is $45/day plus tax. The subway station is only a .1 of a mile away. Go to www.springone2gx.com/travel <www.springone2gx.com/travel> for subway / train station details.
Sundry Items: There is a Walgreens and a 7-Eleven within a ten-minute walk from the Washington Marriott Marquis.
Marriott Marquis Hotel 901 Massachusetts Avenue NW Washington, District Of Columbia 20001 USA [map <https://www.google.com/maps/place/Marriott+Marquis+Washington,+Washington,+DC+20001/@38.9036283,-77.0247219,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89b7b792e03c44d1:0xbbfcef3a3f4dfa2>] (202) 824-9200
MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 14TH AGENDA Registration: 3:00–6:30PM M4 Level Conference Center in Salon A-D.(Photo ID required at check in.) You will receive your attendee badge, swag bag & SpringOne 2GX 2015 t-shirt.
Welcome Reception: 4:30PM in M4 Conference Center Foyer – enjoy a cold beverage and some fresh popped popcorn. Check out the sponsors, they have a lot to offer!
Dinner & Keynote: 6:30PM Marquis Ballroom
Opening Night Reception: 8:00PM sponsored by Target, Inc. – Mezzanine Ballroom Foyer at M2 Conference Center, come and enjoy a Target-tini and Hors D'oeuvres (among other beverages).
SCHEDULE/AGENDA Schedule Builder is live! Go to http://www.springone2gx.com <http://www.springone2gx.com>, and click “sign-in to schedule”, and use the credentials you created when you registered. Then find a session (one per time slot), and click schedule to choose. Use the schedule view to print out a summary of your choices. Schedule view is located in the main site menu under “Account” → “Your schedule”.
Recent agenda updates: The event agenda, rooms, and schedule are finalized.
- Have a short stack with The New Stack <http://thenewstack.io> <http://thenewstack.io>: They are sponsoring podcasts and pancakes during Tuesday’s breakfast starting at 7:30. Make sure to check out the speakers and interact with them! - Target, Inc is sponsoring the opening night reception at 8:00pm on Monday in the Marquis Ballroom Foyer, right outside the keynote area. - Spring and Groovy/Grails Birds-of-a-feather sessions are on Wednesday 7-9 pm on M4 level in Salon A-D
PASSPORT GAME We’ll have a passport game at the show. Visit the Pivotal Demo Lounge Area, watch three key demos and visit the sponsors to get the awesome show track jacket as a gift!
RECORDED SESSIONS - EARLY ACCESS We are filming all SpringOne tracks, and the vast majority of the 2GX tracks (only a few sessions from the G&G special topics track that won’t be filmed) and publishing them in HD for registered attendees within days after the conference. Now you can see any sessions you missed! Videos will also become freely available 3-4/week for non-SpringOne2GX 2015 attendees over the next 6 months, but as attendees you get instant access much sooner. A separate email on Monday Sept 14th will be sent with your access code and more details.
It’s going to be an incredible event. You are one of the lucky ones who gets to go to conferences. Enjoy it and we’ll make sure you get the goods to bring it back for your team!
Sincerely, The Spring Team at Pivotal, and the No Fluff Just Stuff team
